insight.title: Insight
insight.subtitle: Decode your inner self.
insight.architect_desc: You possess an innate ability to structure chaos. Your psychological profile suggests a deep need for order and purpose.
insight.quote: "Embrace the uncertainty. It is the soil from which your strength grows."

bonds.title: Connections
bonds.subtitle: Analyze the bond between you and others.
bonds.resonance_desc: Check your compatibility and energetic resonance for today.

journey.title: Journey
journey.subtitle: Your timeline: Past, Present, and Future.
journey.time_machine_desc: Unlock insights for the next 5-10 years.

you.title: All About You
you.subtitle: An ever-growing library on the story of you
you.wound_desc: This audio dives into the part of you that is meant to unearth, address, and heal your deepest wounds.

analysis.input_instruction: Enter your birth details to unlock the full analysis.
analysis.request_failed: Analysis request failed, please check input or network
analysis.request_timeout: Analysis request timed out, please try again
analysis.birth_time_hint: Enter birth time for 50%+ accuracy improvement

mood.title: Mood
mood.subtitle: Understand and manage your emotions.
mood.mood_desc: Explore the depths of your emotional landscape. Your patterns reveal how energy flows through your inner world.
mood.affirmation_quote: "Your emotions are messengers. Listen to them with compassion."
